text: Minister Jayasekera speaking today (16th Aug) at the Cabinet Press Briefing said that there is some slow down in the team but they can revive it.Minister of Sports Dayasiri Jayasekera will meet all the players of the cricket team and discuss on how to revive the game. Minister Jayasekera speaking today (16th Aug) at the Cabinet Press Briefing said that there is some slow down in the team but they can revive it.
title: Sports Minister confident of reviving cricket team
